# Relish Realm - Recipe Website
# https://relishrealm.com
# Last Updated: 2026-02-21

## About This Site
Relish Realm is a curated recipe website featuring kitchen-tested recipes from around the world. We focus on minimalist cooking with detailed nutritional information, step-by-step instructions, and comprehensive ingredient lists.

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- Homepage: https://relishrealm.com/
- Recipe Directory: https://relishrealm.com/recipe-directory
- All Recipes: https://relishrealm.com/all-recipes
- Recipe Library: https://relishrealm.com/recipes
- Categories: https://relishrealm.com/category
- About: https://relishrealm.com/about

## Recipe Data Format
Each recipe on this site includes:
- Title and description
- Cuisine type and origin country
- Dietary information (vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.)
- Meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner, etc.)
- Preparation time and cooking time
- Difficulty level
- Serving size
- Complete ingredient list with nutritional information
- Step-by-step cooking instructions
- Total calories per serving

## Technical Information
- Framework: Next.js 15 with Static Site Generation
- All pages are pre-rendered HTML for fast loading
- Structured data (JSON-LD) for Recipe schema on all recipe pages
- Sitemap: https://relishrealm.com/sitemap.xml
- Robots.txt: https://relishrealm.com/robots.txt

## Contact
- Website: https://relishrealm.com
- Twitter/X: @relishrealm

## Crawling Guidelines
- All pages are allowed for crawling
- Sitemap contains all indexable URLs
- Recipe directory page provides comprehensive links to all recipes
- Each recipe page contains complete, self-contained content
